JEVGENIJ IVANOV
DEVELOPER PORTFOLIO

Software and Games

Dungeon Forge

March 26, 2024

Godot 4 extension plugin that allows users to generate dungeon-like layouts in their scenes with a click of a button.

Spotify Playlist Enhancer

January 12, 2024

Google Chrome Extension that allows users to authenticate their Spotify account, view their top 5 played tracks, get top 5 recommended tracks, and generate new playlists based on these tracks.

Slayer

October 02, 2023

Slayer is an exciting top-down isometric roguelike game that immerses players in a world of strategic combat and character progression.

Combat Clicker

October 01, 2023

Combat Clicker is a browser-based, turn-based game where you face off against a cunning rat warrior. Outthink and outmaneuver the rat to claim victory!

ScreenTime LockScreen

September 03, 2023

ScreenTime LockScreen is an Android application that provides a custom lock screen experience and displays your total screen time on your applicatoins.

Soviet Russia Joke Generator

September 01, 2023

A Java program that generates random "In Soviet Russia" jokes and compares their SHA-256 hash codes.

Space Shooter Game

May 11, 2023

A retro-style space shooter game where players control a spaceship to destroy incoming meteors.

File Converter

April 01, 2023

A versatile file converter that transforms files between various formats such as JSON, CSV, MD, and HTML.

SVG Shape Generator

March 23, 2023

A C# application to create, manage, and export SVG shapes like circles, rectangles, polygons, and more.

Java Wordle Game

March 12, 2023

A Wordle-inspired game implemented in Java where players guess a word in six attempts.
